name: Digital Ninja Singh
tagline: Turning Your Idea Into Next Big Thing
description:
Galactic Work is an award-winning custom app development company providing one-stop full-cycle mobile solutions globally, since 2017. We are an expert in providing Enterprise Mobility solutions. You can hire team from us for your app consulting, design, development, or testing requirements. We empower you to focus on your Business operations, while we focus on your development needs. 
Through apps, we have created success stories for Fortune 1000 companies and startups alike across multiple verticals including Real Estate, Finance, eCommerce, Healthcare, Social, News, Internet of Things (IoT), Automobile, and more. We have been awarded and recommended by research agencies including Clutch, Sourcelysis, Best Web Design Agencies, Red Herring and many more.  
Our Key Differentiators: 
Proven track record in developing complex, mission-critical iOS and Android apps. 100% success in App Store approval.
We have the habit of going into details and you can count on us for awesome, pixel-perfect UI/UX designs.
We deliver using cutting edge technology solution.
Service Offering: 
Mobile Product Strategy
Prototyping & Concept Development
iOS App Development
Android App Development
Web App Development
Security & Compliance
App Analytics
App Indexing 
READ MORE...
